did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Letter by Ignace G. LaGrange, 1978, relating to Sylwin Strakacz, secretary to Ignace Jan Paderewski, prime minister of Poland; a copy of the will of Paderewski, 1930; and recordings of radio broadcasts by Polish political leaders, 1939, relating to the invasion of Poland.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Use copies of all sound recordings in this collection are available for immediate access.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Marian Marek Drozdowski collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1980.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Letter by Ignace G. LaGrange, 1978, relating to Sylwin Strakacz, secretary to Ignace Jan Paderewski, prime minister of Poland; a copy of the will of Paderewski, 1930; and recordings of radio broadcasts by Polish political leaders, 1939, relating to the invasion of Poland.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1939-1945--Poland.

scopecontent.p: Letter by Ignace G. LaGrange, 1978, relating to Sylwin Strakacz, secretary to Ignace Jan Paderewski, prime minister of Poland; a copy of the will of Paderewski, 1930

did.unittitle: Sound recording of radio broadcasts made by various people from Warsaw

scopecontent.p: Includes: Joseph Beck, September 3; M. Niedzialkowski, September 9; S. Starzynski, September 11; W. Sierpinski, September 5; J. Bryan, September 12; S. Starzynski, September 18. (1 open reel tape)
